series_list.rise_message:
Keepsake Ribbon (VII), Crystal Sword (VII), and Adamant Bangle (VII) added to Relic Draw!
From 5:00 PM 8/17 PST (1:00 AM 8/18 UTC) to 4:59 PM 8/27 PST (12:59 AM 8/28 UTC) the drop rate of these items plus Guard Stick (VII), Wizard Bracelet (VII), Gold Armlet (VII), and Butterfly Edge (VII) is increased relative to other 5★ equipment. After this period ends, the drop rate of these items will decrease to the drop rate of other 5★ equipment.
NOTE: An increase in the drop rate of an item compared to other items of the same rarity does not mean that the likelihood of receiving that item increases against other rarities (e.g. 5★ vs. 4★). To compare the rarity of 1★, 2★, 3★, 4★, and 5★ items in general, and the likelihood of receiving any rarity against another rarities, please see Menu > Help > Other > About Rarity.

series_list.rise_message:
Blazefire Saber (XIII), Vega 42s (XIII), Keepsake Knife (XIII), and Sanctum Gloves (XIII) added to Relic Draw!
From 5:00 PM 8/10 PST (1:00 AM 8/11 UTC) to 4:59 PM 8/20 PST (12:59 AM 8/21 UTC) the drop rate of these items plus Hunter's Rod (XIII), Kaiser Knuckles (XIII), and Gold Bangle (XIII) is increased relative to other 5★ equipment. After this period ends, the drop rate of these items will decrease to the drop rate of other 5★ equipment.
NOTE: An increase in the drop rate of an item compared to other items of the same rarity does not mean that the likelihood of receiving that item increases against other rarities (e.g. 5★ vs. 4★). To compare the rarity of 1★, 2★, 3★, 4★, and 5★ items in general, and the likelihood of receiving any rarity against other rarities, please see Menu > Help > Other > About Rarity.
